original_text: So the Philistines were subdued and they stopped invading Israel’s territory. Throughout Samuel’s lifetime, the hand of the Lord was against the Philistines.
korean_text: 이에 블레셋 사람들이 굴복하여 다시는 이스라엘 지역 안에 들어오지 못하였으며 여호와의 손이 사무엘이 사는 날 동안에 블레셋 사람을 막으시매

sentences.original_text: and they stopped invading Israel's territory
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이스라엘 영토를 침공하는 것을 멈췄습니다

sentences.original_text: the hand of the Lord was against the Philistines
